title: Translational Medicine Group
description: A secure and cost-effective clinical trial management system offering rapid setup and a web-based portal tailored for small to medium-sized trials, developed by the Research Informatics Core at MGH's Center for Systems Biology.

title: Verily
description: An advanced clinical trial management system designed to streamline research processes, Verily Viewpoint Site CTMS digitizes study protocols, enhances user experience to reduce burnout, and optimizes operations for higher-quality and cost-effective trials.
